description.brief: Control Toolbox -- library for efficient modelling, control, estimation, trajectory optimization and model predictive control

package.description: This is the ADRL Control Toolbox ('CT'), an open-source C++ library for efficient modelling, control, estimation, trajectory optimization and model predictive control. The CT is applicable to a broad class of dynamic systems, but features additional modelling tools specially designed for robotics. This page outlines its general concept, its major building blocks and highlights selected application examples.
